Posts.EditableText:
Hi! I'm a story creators but this is my first time creating a text based game for
one of my ideas. For now the progress has 5 endings, and I really would appreciate
feedback! To make it easier, choose the last option at the restaurant, from there you
will have many endings. All that category endings is completed and is just the shortest,
so imagine how many is left to come!

My story is somewhat serious somewhat parody of japanese eroges where you
can have a relationship with weird sentient beings in a cyberpunk setting.
All feedback will be highly appreciated and I hope to improve as keep uploading
more routes and adventure plot.

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ua3duydvsemwyu7gsgegpg/trash-sin-city

Posts.EditableText: Your game is quite interesting but the thing is that  it lack the thrill that these text based games required i think you should work on that
Posts.HTML: Your game is quite interesting but the thing is that it lack the thrill that these text based games required i think you should work on that

Posts.EditableText: I'm not really sure where this story is going, although I'm not usually big on game books. I would just like to know what kind of story I'm reading.
